channel.title: Issue With Client Compiler + Run
channel.description:
This is the current source + Client I'm using.
[code]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,544448.0.html[/code]
THIS IS MY COMPILER ISSUE - AND NOTEPAD
ISSUE: [code]Error loading: C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\msvcr71.dll Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Alert/java Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Alert.java at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Alert.java. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
NOTEPAD: [code]@echo off Title Ventrix Compiler (PLEASE DONT COMPILE!) "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" *.java pause[/code]
RUN SERVER NOTEPAD + ERROR NOT SHOWN , SCREEN JUST FLASHES
SERVER NOTEPAD: [code]@echo off Title Ventrix cd ./ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xms250m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit[/code]
error: black screen just flashes and you can't see it.

item.title: Issue With Client Compiler + Run
item.dc:creator: @Thebankshow Thebankshow
item.description:
@Thebankshow wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:441827”]Run client patch

2,5c2
< Title Ventrix
< cd ./
< "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xms250m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
< exit
---
> java -Xms250m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32

compile patch

2,3c2
< Title Ventrix Compiler (PLEASE DONT COMPILE!)
< "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" *.java
---
> javac *.java

Note: You’re going to need to install GNU Patch to apply these fixes. You’ll also need to set you environment variables (there’s a tutorial on the forums)[/quote]

FIXED TY

Read full topic

item.title: Issue With Client Compiler + Run
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Run client patch

2,5c2
< Title Ventrix
< cd ./
< "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xms250m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
< exit
---
> java -Xms250m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32

compile patch

2,3c2
< Title Ventrix Compiler (PLEASE DONT COMPILE!)
< "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" *.java
---
> javac *.java

Note: You’re going to need to install GNU Patch to apply these fixes. You’ll also need to set you environment variables (there’s a tutorial on the forums)

Read full topic

item.title: Issue With Client Compiler + Run
item.dc:creator: @Thebankshow Thebankshow
item.description:
@Thebankshow wrote:

This is the current source + Client I’m using.

THIS IS MY COMPILER ISSUE - AND NOTEPAD

ISSUE:

Error loading: C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\msvcr71.dll Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Alert/java Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Alert.java at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Alert.java. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

NOTEPAD:

@echo off Title Ventrix Compiler (PLEASE DONT COMPILE!) "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" *.java pause

RUN SERVER NOTEPAD + ERROR NOT SHOWN , SCREEN JUST FLASHES

SERVER NOTEPAD:

@echo off Title Ventrix cd ./ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xms250m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit

error: black screen just flashes and you can’t see it.

Read full topic
